name: IOUserAudioStream
desc: An audio object that performs I/O for an audio device.

items.name: + Create
items.desc: Allocates and initializes an instance of the audio stream class.

items.name: - init
items.desc: Initializes an instance of the audio stream class.

items.name: - free
items.desc: Frees the audio stream.

items.name: - GetClassID
items.desc: Gets the audio class identifier of the object.

items.name: - GetBaseClassID
items.desc: Gets the audio class identifier of the base class object.

items.name: - StartIO
items.desc: Tells the stream to start I/O.

items.name: - StopIO
items.desc: Tells the stream to stop I/O.

items.name: - SetCurrentStreamFormat
items.desc: Sets the current stream format to a given audio stream basic description.

items.name: - GetCurrentStreamFormat
items.desc: Returns the current stream format, as an audio stream basic description.

items.name: - SetAvailableStreamFormats
items.desc: Sets the available stream formats to an array of audio stream basic descriptions.

items.name: - GetAvailableStreamFormats
items.desc: Returns the available stream formats as an array of audio stream basic descriptions.

items.name: - GetNumberAvailableStreamFormats
items.desc: Returns the number of available stream formats.

items.name: - GetStreamDirection
items.desc: Gets the direction of the stream: input or output.

items.name: - SetStreamIsActive
items.desc: Sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the stream is active and doing I/O.

items.name: - GetStreamIsActive
items.desc: Gets a value that indicates whether the stream is active and doing I/O.

items.name: - SetTerminalType
items.desc: Sets the terminal type of the stream.

items.name: - GetTerminalType
items.desc: Gets the terminal type of the stream.

items.name: - GetIOMemoryDescriptor
items.desc: Gets the memory descriptor the stream uses for I/O.

items.name: - SetIOMemoryDescriptor
items.desc: Sets the memory descriptor the stream uses for I/O.

items.name: - HandleChangeCurrentStreamFormat
items.desc: Tells the stream the format is changing.

items.name: - HandleChangeStreamIsActive
items.desc: Tells the stream the activity state is changing.

items.name: - DeviceSampleRateChanged
items.desc: Updates stream formats, in response to the owning audio device changing its sample rate.
